ending_theme: #01: "stella ~Kinpika Joushou Kibun~ (stella ～きんぴか上昇気分～)" by Kakeru Shiwasu (Yuki Kaji) (ep 1)
#02: "initium ~Shikou Hyouron~ (initium～始告氷輪～)" by Hajime Mutsuki (Kousuke Toriumi) (ep 2)
#03: "amor ~Afure dasu Omoi kara (amor～溢れだす想いから～) Koi Kisaragi (Toshiki Masuda) (ep 3)
#04: "ver ~Utayomidori no Koe (ver～歌詠鳥の声～)" by Haru Yayoi (Tomoaki Maeno) (ep 4)
#05: "cerasus ~Sakura Namiki ni Michikarete~ (cerasus～桜並木に導かれて～)" by Arata Uzuki (Yoshimasa Hosoya) (ep 5)
#07: "pluvia ~Uso to Nukumori~ (pluvia～嘘と温もり～)" by Rui Minazuki (Shouta Aoi) (ep 7)
#08: "mare ~Kimi to Tsuzuru Koukai Nisshi (mare～君と綴る航海日誌～)" Kai Fuzuki (Wataru Hatano) (ep 8)
#10: "nox ~Kaze no Record~ (nox～風のレコード～)" Yoru Nagatsuki (Takashi Kondou) (ep 10)
#11: "athletic ~Never Ending Challenge!!~ (athletic～Never Ending Challenge!!～)" by Iku Kannazuki (Kensho Ono) (ep 11)
#12: "albion ~Futari Dake Shiro~ (albion～ふたりだけの白～)" by Shun Shimotsuki (Ryouhei Kimura) (ep 12)
#13: "Tsuki no Uta. (ツキノウタ。)" by Six Gravity & Procellarum (ep 13)
